dmca.title: Submission of Notice of Copyright Violation
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

 

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

 

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

 

Please visit our web site at
www.theplanet.com/about_us/legal_docs/ThePlanet%20Copyright%20Infringeme
nt%2001%2015%2007%20FINAL.pdf

 

Legal Response Team

THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

 

 

________________________________

From: rpendry@gmail.com [mailto:rpendry@gmail.com] On Behalf Of Richard
Pendry
Sent: Thursday, February 15, 2007 11:30 AM
To: Copyright
Cc: legal@mousebreaker.co.uk; Alick Stott
Subject: Submission of Notice of Copyright Violation

 

Dear Sir/Madam

In accordance with ThePlanet.com's Copyright Infringement Procedure I
have just sent a fax for the attention of Andrea Z. Ameida, the
designated agent. 

I would appreciate it if you could confirm receipt of this fax, and also
advise of any further information required. 

Regards
Richard Pendry

Director
Mousebreaker Ltd
http://www.mousebreaker.co.uk

http://www.mousebreaker.com
http://www.playforyourclub.com
http://www.playapal.com
http://www.blastbilliards.com
http://www.flashcricket.com
http://www.camperstrike.co.uk

The information transmitted is intended only for the person or entity to
which it is addressed and may contain confidential and/or privileged
material.

Any use (including retransmission or copying) of this information by
persons or entities other than the intended recipient is prohibited. If
you are not the intended recipient of this transmission, please contact
the sender and delete the material from any computer. The sender is not
responsible for the completeness or accuracy of this communication as it
has been transmitted over a public network
